CustomField.description: Used Internally for Reports only Not on page views
CustomField.formula: CASE(MONTH( CloseDate ), 1, "1. JANUARY", 2, "2. FEBRUARY", 3, "3. MARCH", 4, "4. APRIL", 5, "5. MAY", 6, "6. JUNE", 7, "7. JULY", 8, "8. AUGUST", 9, "9. SEPTEMBER", 10, "91. OCTOBER", 11, "92. NOVEMBER", 12, "93. DECEMBER", "None")
CustomField.label: Close Date, Mo, Text
